achievements.title: Eternal Spring
achievements.desc: It all started one fateful morning in April...

achievements.title: At the Gates of Eden
achievements.desc: You're so close to heaven, you can almost feel it.

achievements.title: Banquet of the Golden Witch
achievements.desc: You've challenged her to a game. There is no turning back, now.

achievements.title: Hacking to the Gate
achievements.desc: All these games have made of you a wizard; you can crack any code without breaking a sweat.
